website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for outdoor performance, the Ariat Skyline Slip-On has gotten high marks for being downright comfortable and easy to wear.  And even if it doesn't have laces, this shoe keeps the foot secure on and off the trail. But what has really impressed lots of outdoor junkies is the quality craftsmanship behind every pair.There are truly so many things to love about this shoe, including its stylish design and protective features. However, as some hikers find it, it isn't suited for long hikes or challenging terrains. In such cases, you are better off with a more rugged hiking boot.
pros: Lots of customers have given the Ariat Skyline Slip-On shoes excellent ratings for their unbelievable comfort
Nearly everyone is impressed by how convenient and easy wearing they can be
Despite the lack of laces, many reviewers agree that this shoe gives them a secure fit
Many think that the Ariat Skyline Slip-On hiking shoes are built to last
A significant number of users find them to be very supportive
Dozens of wearers also admire its protective features, particularly the leather bumpers in the front and rear sections
cons: Several users find these shoes somewhat narrow
Some people think that the Skyline Slip-On isn't for serious hiking

customer_reviews.title: Runs small & not a hiking/trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice slip on moc by Ariat. I like the neutral heel, which isn't common for most Ariat boots. I find them a tad small for a men's 10M. I didn't realise this until I wore them a few times, so too late to return them. As long as I wear no socks, I can use them for shoveling snow or mowing the grass. If you have a narrow foot, they seem ok, but they run small. Wouldn't recommend for hiking . They have too pointed of a toe box & a long day of hiking or trail walking will cause blisters . They do offer great mind foot support & the sole is good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.text: They are great shoes! I bought them as something I could slip on and off easily but that would have good traction. They have performed better than I had hoped. The only issue I’ve had at all is a little bit of unexpected wear around the front part of the shoe by my ankle. It’s caused by them rubbing together as I walk and move around. All in all o would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: E F

customer_reviews.title: Had to send them back.Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect just out of the box, wore them for a weekend around the house And fit like a glove...But Monday I Wore them to work and they started blistering at the Heel , What a disappointment, Had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: PHILIP G

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes as a gift for my nephew. He loves them and said they're very comfortable. They're made very well. Ariat makes very good quality shoes/boots.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe! It is attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe! It is attractive, comfortable from the moment I put it on, apears well made, and best of all you don't have to mess with those dam shoe laces that never stay tied and wear out long befor the shoe does. Well look for these shoes again when my other shoes wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J.

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish leather slip ones.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these slip on shoes. They fit a little tight in the toe area but after wearing them a few days they are fitting better. I’m sure after wearing them a few weeks they fit even better.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe overall, some minor complaints
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the back part of the shoe by the Achilles tendon is not scooped, and so it abraded on my leg. The laced version if the skyline is scooped back there and fits wonderfully, so I don't understand why that decision was made with the slip on.
customer_reviews.author: studentZ

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed a better shoe. I have had lady Ariat's, I loved the support and style. He loves his new stylish, comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these same shoes while we were out in Colorado, then 2 months later our house burned down and the shoes were lost. He was thrilled that I was able to find these and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ritting

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy-starting to fall apart after 3mo
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes 3 months ago, and don't use them heavily - mostly just back and forth from my car. I didn't even go hiking. If you plan to use this for hikes or even long walks I doubt they'd hold up more than 2 or 3 trips. Disappointing. They actually look nice and are pretty comfy... though a little on the narrow side.
customer_reviews.author: Alex A

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. I will buy only ariot from now on
customer_reviews.author: coyote_juice

customer_reviews.title: Slip-on
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stylish, well designed and constructed with superior insole and craftsmanship. Highly recommend to anyone seeking an outdoor, casual, go anywhere shoe. Great value when considering quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Shipbuilder

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Husband wears them all the time and said to buy him more.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy to Bee

customer_reviews.title: Tough and good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, well made, and tough. My husband wears these shoes all the time. He really likes having a slip on that takes the work of a boot.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes in early January, by early March both shoes have the fabric pulling out of the seams. The return window has closed but I would at least like an exchange or something. They fit nice and are comfy but they shouldn't be falling apart this quick. I had a pair of merrils that lasted about 3 years. Probably going back to those.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and comfort of these shoes. They are easy on and off. These shoes are built sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but too narrow for me. Wish I could have kept them
customer_reviews.author: DarrenInDenver

customer_reviews.title: Nicely styled. Comfy fit.
customer_reviews.text: The leather is not smooth and shows scuffs easily. Even pant cuffs over time leave marks. But overall I am satisfied. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe. Shoes help you stand with better posture.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe a little tight out of the box but loosens up after break in. I will be buying another pair soon. Just wish they had a few more colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Great white hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable casual multipurpose shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a comfortable casual shoe and these fit the bill. Have walked miles at a time in them with no foot fatigue or problems. Good traction for lite hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Kays487

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I used for work, they are very comfortable and light!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose chavez

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for a fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit too tight. I bought a size up and they still pinch my feet...like really hard. Also, there is very little cushioning in the sole, so much so that my feet hurt after wearing them for a while.Its almost as if there is nothing protecting your feet from the hard pavement. Save your money, there are much better shoes out there less than the price for this overpriced crap.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had them on just for a little while and they were fine/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first about how well these would hold up for everyday outside usage. They are great, I have been wearing them almost everyday. They have good arch support. I tried going back to my hiking boots I usually wear all the time and they hurt my feet so I will probably be buying at least one more pair of these in the near future. They seem to be holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as the boots. Might work ok for someone with wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Scatpack392

customer_reviews.title: but quite comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high instep. The shoe was a little snug going on, but quite comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes, They fit perfectly. And he loves the style.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe that stretches enough over time to more easily get your foot in
customer_reviews.text: A really nice shoe but as many have commented, they are difficult to get your feet into due to the restricted opening, which basically defeats the reason why we buy slip on footwear. However on the plus side, they are sturdy and attractive. Update: after 2 years these shoes have proven themselves through various terrains including steeper mountain trails and after tidying them up are good to go in town. They did eventually stretch to allow me getting my feet in easier and I try to use a shoe horn most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert

customer_reviews.title: EE not very wide
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a similar style Ariat shoe in the past that was very comfortable, so I assumed this one would be as well. However, the EE is not nearly as wide as a typical EE sized shoe. It feels quite a lot narrower than what I was expecting. I have already worn them for a couple of days, hoping they might stretch out, but they still feel really tight. I'll continue trying to stretch them out, but I'll look for another brand for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neal N.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty, But Beefy, Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ariat makes a good shoe (okay, so far, but this is my second pair of these types, and I've seen nothing but strength). This is a solid shoe, and very comfy (okay, after a few break-in wearings). I love the style. Makes me feel a bit younger than the 2x2x3x5 I am.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Borgen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy on, but snug enough to stay put and not be sloppy. Well made, rugged construction.
customer_reviews.author: Wynterknight

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, great, comfortable, easy-on easy-off. My second pair. Soles very durable, last a longtime.
customer_reviews.author: rk64

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable work shoe
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Ariat footwear. Very comfortable work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cut is somewhat small but I was able to stretch them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and supportive. Too bad they aren't waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

customer_reviews.title: Rubs heels.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these, there is a rub spot on the heel back, not at all like Ariat, as I love Ariats products, they normally are so comfortable, these skyline were not. Arait always runs small, I buy a half to full size bigger
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Even though description says size 11.5 D, you receive the correct size
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to slipping on my heel. Wished they had fit because of the great price it was offered at. This shoe does not have a notch in the heel like their Rockwood Endurance model which may account for the heel slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Quality good
customer_reviews.text: I think they were narrower than should have been for a wide size
customer_reviews.author: Melva Buckhanon

product_meta.title: ARIAT Mens Skyline Slip-on
product_meta.description: Engineered for outdoor performance, Ariat's Skyline is constructed for durability, comfort and protection.
